content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You will be renting for at least one year to get a good price otherwise rental is considered as short term and the price will be significantly higher.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.\\tDecide on apartment criteria (location, arrangement, price, transport) as much as you can\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\tIf you are not confident please contact one of the real estate agencies, otherwise you can try various aggregators and rent apartment on your own\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\tConsider options and choose a few good ones. Reply to the agent or owner quickly, good options disappear within a couple of days.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4.\\tArrange visits and check the apartment. Ask for monthly payment, deposit (kaucja), administrative payments (czynsz), and media (gas, water, electricity). Ask for an agency fee to get the full price. Don't leave the deposit without confirmations (receipt, contract, agreement) and check owner documents if you prefer to rent on your own. Check that everything works and there is no debt.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5.\\tSign the agreement and make sure you put in start date, end date, how to obtain keys, how to return the deposit, all payments, the way they will be made and due dates.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
